name: Welcome To The Backrooms!
description:
The Backrooms Level 0 is a non-linear space, resembling the back rooms of a retail outlet. All rooms in Level 0 appear uniform and share superficial features such as yellowed wallpaper, damp carpet, and inconsistently placed fluorescent lighting. However, no two rooms within the Level are identical. 

     You play as a Kanbrit Technologies employee, navigating The Backrooms, trying to maintain your sanity, and being taken by The Entities. The tutorial of the game contains more information about the gameplay.

THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ALPHA, IT IS NOT VERY POLISHED. PLEASE DON'T GO COMPLAINING IN THE COMMENTS. TO ENSURE THE FUTURE DEVELOPMENT OF THIS GAME, DONATING IS HIGHLY APPRECIATED!
